name: Ardeal System
short_description:
Ardeal System is the result of ZintoriOS (this why the first released version is a 2.0)

It is an easy to use Ubuntu-based Linux distribution which is stylish and (typically) makes sense to both Windows and OS X users.

It uses KDE as a framework to provide the default UI which is customizable to any user's liking and it also contains XFCE for computers with hardware that requires lighter UI elements.

The project is in late development (Release Candidates) and you might see many 'BETA' stickers. Don't worry, it is ready for production use and keep in mind that until the final RTM pops up, you may need to frequently upgrade it manually!
summary: Fast, easy to use Linux-based operating system
